itemDisplayName: Zero-downtime Deployment to AKS with Jenkins
description: This template allows you to do zero-downtime deployment to AKS Kubernetes cluster with Jenkins. It deploys an instance of Jenkins on a Linux Ubuntu 16.04 LTS VM and an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS). The Jenkins instance will configured with jobs to deploy Tomcat container to the AKS Kubernetes in RollingUpdate or blue/green strategy without downtime.
summary: This template deploys a Jenkins instance and an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), with Jenkins jobs configured to do RollingUpdate or blue/green deployment to AKS Kubernetes.
